live.description:
WHALE 為券商提供一站式、開箱即用的產品和解決方案，所有系統均基於雲原生架構，券商可以根據實際業務需求靈活選擇。
更低成本、更具競爭力的產品體驗，點擊免費試用！
live.keywords: LONGBRIDGE，WHALE，SaaS，互聯網證券，證券交易系統，BSS Vendor，經紀自設系統
live.title: Live - LONGBRIDGE WHALE - 一站式互聯網證券交易云服務

trading.title: WHALE Trading Platform
trading.description: WHALE Trading Platform provides customers with better experience of the securities App. Based on the core journey of users - "Discovery → Learning → Trading" and combined with a large amount of structured data, it lowers the threshold for users to understand and participate in trading, allowing users to more easily find investment opportunities in the US, HK, Singapore, Europe, and other international core markets.

virtual-assets.title: Virtual Asset Solution
virtual-assets.description: Whale, as the first provider of virtual asset solutions in the Hong Kong market, offers one-stop services that cover market data, community & news, trading, clearing & settlement, fulfilling all the requirements of our clients for thriving in the virtual asset market. Our solution comes in two versions, Standard and Professional, allowing clients to select the solution that aligns perfectly with their unique needs. Additionally, Whale facilitates the upgrade of our securities solution by integrating a virtual asset module, thereby enhancing product competitiveness to a new height.
virtual-assets.keywords: LONGBRIDGE, WHALE, SaaS, Internet Securities, Securities Trading System, BSS Vendor, Broker Supplied System, Virtual Asset

portai.title: PortAI: AI-powered Investment Knowledge Platform
portai.description: To tackle this challenge, Whale combines state-of-the-art advancements in large language models with its extensive industry expertise to introduce PortAI, aiming to provide AI investment knowledge services based on SaaS. With PortAI, traditional brokers can now harness the power of industry-leading AI services without the need for in-house research resources or expertise in the field of artificial intelligence.
portai.keywords: LONGBRIDGE, WHALE, SaaS, Internet Securities, Securities Trading System, BSS Vendor, Broker Supplied System, portai
